data.name: Sai Saga: The Immortal Demo
data.detailed_description:
Thánh Gióng - The Immortal
He grows up like a wind, in order to win, he needs to concentrate on the battle, just a blink of an eye everything will back to the start. From the South Pole he has to reach the North Pole, can he make it?
data.about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
